categories: Category:Star Wars: X-Wing Miniatures Game Wave I

nodes.text: The TIE Fighter Expansion Pack is a supplement to the Star Wars: X-Wing Miniatures Game from Fantasy Flight Games. The expansion features a detailed miniature of the TIE/LN starfighter. It was released on September 14, 2012 as part of the game's first wave of expansions.

Relying on speed and strength in numbers to overcome their enemies, TIE fighters have only a pair of laser cannons and lack shields of any kind, yet their dexterity makes them dangerous opponents. The TIE Fighter Expansion Pack for the Star Wars: X-Wing Miniatures Game includes one stunning miniature, plus its necessary cards, tokens, and dial. Also included are six pilots, like the crafty Imperial pilot "Backstabber," one of Darth Vader's wingmen in the Battle of Yavin.
The TIE Fighter Expansion Pack contains one miniature, plus a maneuver dial and all action tokens, as well as pilot and upgrade cards.
